awards.text: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: A young woman gets killed in an accident trying to meet her favorite actress Myrtle Gordon after a play. Then Myrtle Gordon felt responsible for the killing leading her down to an emotional crisis that interferes with her professional work as an actress.
plot: An actress suffers an emotional uproar in her personal life after a fan dies trying to see her.
title: Opening Night

tomatoes.consensus: Opening Night is as dense and difficult as one would expect from John Cassavetes, but even the director's detractors will be unable to deny the power of Gena Rowlands' performance.
